titles.title: I've Been Changed, I've Been New-born

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've been changed, I've been new-born.
All my life has been rearranged
What a difference it's made
Since my Lord came and stayed in my heart.
O! Yes, I've been changed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Me cambió, me salvó
Toda mi vida el Señor arregló
Que diferencia hay en mí
Desde que Cristo vino a mí
Gloria a Dios! el Señor me cambió.
